name: Octo!
description:
Welcome to Octo!

You're an adventurous octopus hunting for exotic treasures in a drowned city. Use skills like camoflauge, ink clouds, and your water jet to avoid danger and stay out of sight from predators.

Made for minijam #108: Seaside.

The game jam limitation was "only one life," so be careful! If Octo is damaged, you'll have to restart the level.

All art, assets, code, and music by Thom Erickson. 

Some sound effects by zapsplat.com and the Fibberish font by Nathan Scott.
